name: Pillow Pinky
description:
Pillow Pinky and his friends are space travelling slims that happened to they took a wrong turn in space and they need fuel so they scan the nearby planets and find one with possible fuel source. They send out scouts but they don't return the first officer pillow Pinky goes down to check out the situation only to find out that the natives have gotten too friendly with his crew lol gives you a double goal of finding fuel while simultaneously looking for your friends #arcade #platformer

Early Access is out, Use shift to go to next level
